data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pachelle, Paulo P. G., Leray, Matthieu, Anker, Arthur, Lasley, Robert (2018): Five new records of marine shrimps (Decapoda: Caridea, Stenopodidea) from the Caribbean coast of Panama. Zootaxa 4438 (1): 128-136, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4438.1.5|8 occurrences
